# viewController

**Instance Property**

A view controller whose view is displayed in the bar to represent this item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var viewController: NSViewController? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When set, the item’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCustomTouchBarItem/view] property returns the view controller’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewController/view] property.

The property is automatically set to `nil` if you provide your own value for the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSCustomTouchBarItem/view] property.

## Providing item content

- **view**: The view displayed in the bar to represent this item.
